problem_text_cn: 如图,某数学学习兴趣小组为了测量树AB的度数,他们测得此树在阳光下的影子BC的长为9m,在相同时刻,他们还测得小亮在阳光下的影长为1.5m,已知小亮的身高为1.8m,则树AB的高为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in order to measure the degree of tree AB, a certain mathematics learning interest group measured the length of the tree's shadow BC in the sun as N_0. At the same moment, they also measured the shadow length of Xiaoliang in the sun as N_1. Knowing that Xiaoliang's height is N_2, then the height of tree AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵同一时刻物高与影长成正比例．∴1.8:1.5=树AB的高:9,∴树AB的高是10.8米．故选:A．
